artefact.overview: You need a licence to sell or expose for sale, salmon, trout, eels, pike or pollen in Northern Ireland
artefact.will_continue_on: the Department of Culture, Arts and Leisure website
artefact.licence_short_description: A Fish dealer's licence is needed to sell or expose for sale, salmon, trout, eels, pike or pollen from a vehicle or premises.
artefact.licence_overview:
You must have a licence from the [Department of Culture, Arts and Leisure](http://www.dcalni.gov.uk/ "Department of Culture, Arts and Leisure"){:rel="external"} to sell, or offer or expose for sale, salmon, trout, eels, pike or pollen, from any vehicle or premises.

You must comply with any conditions attached to a licence.
